name: Bullet Hell Monday: Finale
description:
Dive into the thrilling world of bullet hell shooters with "Bullet Hell Monday: Finale"! Even beginners can enjoy this intense action-packed game, featuring a gentle introduction to the bullet hell genre. Get ready for an authentic bullet hell experience!

In "Bullet Hell Monday: Finale," players will navigate through a barrage of bullets while taking down enemies. Upgrade your craft and aim to conquer the challenging Chapter Mode.

Chapter Mode

Embark on various missions in each stage, ranging from simple to challenging. By completing missions like "Defeat 30 enemies!" you'll unlock boss stages. Defeat the bosses to progress to the next chapter.

Craft Upgrades

Enhance your craft through a variety of level-up options, including shot power, shot speed, bomb duration, and more. Upgrade your craft and blast through the stages with devastating firepower.

Beginner-Friendly

The stages start off easy and gradually ramp up in intensity. You are not obligated to clear the difficult missions, so if you find yourself struggling, feel free to try your hand at another mission.

Easy Mode

In Chapter Mode, you can choose the difficulty level before starting a stage. Opting for Easy mode reduces enemy attacks, making it more manageable to complete the stage. If you find yourself stuck, consider selecting Easy mode for a smoother experience.

Other Features

The game supports various controls, including controllers, mouse and keyboard, and keyboard-only setups, allowing players to choose according to their preferences. It also offers support for vertical screen gameplay, providing an immersive experience.


*The screen aspect ratios "16:9" and "16:10" are supported. For other aspect ratios and vertical screen gameplay, some menus will be displayed in a simplified format.
